attributes.action: request Her Majesty The Queen to Dissolve Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition (plea) is in response to public disgust at this present time regarding the disgraceful expenses claims of some MPs. We believe it is now time for Her Majesty The Queen to restore faith, hope and a sense of justice, by illustrating that power and responsibility should not and does not continually corrupt. This can only be achieved by Dissolving Parliament and calling for fresh elections.

Dissolving Parliament is the only way to prove to future politicians and MPs that conduct such as we have recently experienced will never be tolerated.
Please sign this petition to show your hurt caused by these immoral activities.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
